text: The Burnt Wood is a forest in [[Thrane]] near [[Shadukar]], on the shores of [[Scions Sound]]. The wood earned its name during the the reign of terror of [[Sarmondelaryx]], the Burning Dragon, in 22 YK. Although the forest regrew and thrived for several centuries, it was again burned during the destruction of [[Shadukar]] and has not yet fully recovered.
title: Burnt Wood
